website_summaries.verdict: The MU-MIMO enabled Zyxel WRE6606 offers the ease of a plug-and-play Wi-Fi extender, but its performance doesn't quite stand up to the competition.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and always accessible to reconfigure
customer_reviews.text: Quite easy and intuitive to setup. Unlike many other repeaters I've tried, this one is always accessible by IP and not some local host name that doesn't resolve most of the time. It can work in regular repeater mode of the 2 wifi speed channels, and in boost mode using pure 5Ghz to deliver over 60MB p/s file transfers in my tests. It has a gigabit ethernet port to connect to a physical network which is essential if you have other wired machines and a decent NAS. I'm glad I returned the Netgear repeater I only used for 4 hours and ordered this Zyxel immediately as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kei

customer_reviews.title: Sup up your WiFi. Easy...
customer_reviews.text: I made this more of a task than it should have been, but this works really well and has improved my WiFi across the house with great speed.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Welcome little stranger!
customer_reviews.text: Our Zyxel router, from KCOM, on the east side of our property is excellent, but the signal coverage is weak across the west side; the MacBook & Chromebook could/can find it, but more recent devices - iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone not. This is due to some 4 concrete/brick walls. Would this baby do the trick? Due to it's plug/pin arrangement it needed an extension block on the power point in the entrance hall to clear the wall. Alleluia - it worked first time. No problems. The instruction leaflet was adequate, but of course I had an inkling of how to "plumb it in" due to the existing Zyxel router. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well and has got rid of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well and has got rid of the dead spots in the house. Set up should be simple enough but the LED's are confusing and there is no real feed back as to when repeater and the router have successfully connected. Be aware that it does not matter whether you press the WPS button on the repeater first or the modem first.
customer_reviews.author: SW Leadbitter

customer_reviews.title: This is very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This wi-fi extender is the best one I have ever used. It was the easiest to set up and no wires to confuse you and works wonderfully well, I now have wi-fi all through my house with only one piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: dollysisters

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to extend my wifi to my summerhouse in the garden. It works perfectly, I would certainly recommend this product. I would just like to add that I choose this brand because it's the same make as my router
customer_reviews.author: peter wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy set up although my router is Zyxel. The bt one I bought would not connect so took it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: setup
customer_reviews.text: Did not connect immediately had to reset Zyxel router provided by John Lewis and reset against the booster, chose Zyxel to make sure of compatibility
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit & easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to set up, taking less than 5 minutes using WPS. It has done a great job of extending the signal into the far end of the house witbout any need for updates to any of the connecting equipment. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Aylott

customer_reviews.title: Useful and practical
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and works effectively, giving me a strong and reliable signal in a part of the house where before there was none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase. once I got it working
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. once I got it working with help from their technical support
customer_reviews.author: TJQ

customer_reviews.title: Not an eu plug
customer_reviews.text: Searched for EU wi-fi extender and this came up, the picture showed an EU plug and the description didn't contradict it. When it turned up it had a UK plug, and when I checked it had a UK part number, so had to return it and find an alternative product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I would like - doesn't really boost as much as expected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great little box
customer_reviews.text: Once I realised WPS didn't work as advertised I did it the conventional way and everything just worked. Great little box. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Timm

customer_reviews.title: Reliable piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says on the tin. Reliable piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: iPad geek

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to understand setting up but have a Zyxel router so was easier than first thought. Used to extend signal to garden room.
customer_reviews.author: Bartguru

customer_reviews.title: Mis-understanding
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this piece of equipment is brilliant, just it wasn't what I wanted... My fault not the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Keene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! After plugging in I pressed the WPS ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! After plugging in I pressed the WPS button on my router then within 2 minutes the WPS on the extender. Job done. Signal strength much stronger. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: John Metcalf

product_meta.title: Zyxel AC1300 MU-MIMO Wireless Dual Band Range Extender, UK Plug [WRE6606-GB0101F]
product_meta.description:
Simple push-button mode switching

Enjoy the flexibility of choosing how you want to use your Zyxel WRE6606. Simply switch from access point, extender, or client mode with the push of a button. Do you just want to create a modern MU-MIMO wireless network? Use the access point mode. Want to extend your existing wireless network? Select the extender mode. Or do you prefer to connect your wired devices with MU-MIMO capability? Choose the client mode. It's that easy.

Enabling flexible placement for optimal signal extension - WRE6606 includes a micro USB port for connecting portable power banks, enabling you to locate a signal sweet spot to extend your existing wireless network. Forget about constantly searching for wall outlets to power up your device.

Optimal placement even when no outlet is available - WRE6606's USB power port provides you with the ability to temporarily extend network coverage beyond the walls of your home. Take advantage of extended Wi-Fi coverage when relaxing in your backyard or provide wireless network service for outdoor events. 

Features; 

 * Get better performance from your MU-MIMO-ready wireless devices.
 * Improve your office's or home's wireless signal coverage through an existing wireless router or access point
 * The Zyxel WRE6606 includes three different boost modes to enhance your wireless experience. 
 * Sync Wi-Fi settings with Zyxel ONE Connect mobile app
 * Simply switch from access point, extender, or client mode with the push of a button. 



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Wireless Range Extender
Ethernet Cable
Warranty Card
feature_bullets: AC1300 wireless speed for surfing the web, streaming and online gaming
MU-MIMO support provides accelerated wifi speed when multiple users are connected simultaneously
Enjoy the flexibility of choosing how you want to use your Zyxel WRE6606. Simply switch from access point, extender, or client mode with the push of a button
Compact, stylish and non-intrusive design. With dimensions smaller than a teacup, you can plug the device anywhere that fits
Signal strength LED light indicates the best installation location
